preset3:
ffmpeg.exe -y -f dshow -r 29.97 -video_size 1920x1080 -rtbufsize 700M -framerate 29.97 -top 1 -pixel_format uyvy422 -sample_rate 48000 -sample_size 16 -channels 8 -i "video=Decklink Video Capture:audio=Decklink Audio Capture"  -timecode %time% -pix_fmt yuv422p -c:v mpeg2video -profile:v 0 -level:v 2 -b:v 50000k -maxrate 50000k -minrate 50000k -bufsize 20000k -flags +ildct+ilme -top 1 -g 15 -bf 2 -color_primaries 1 -color_trc 1 -colorspace 1 -filter_complex "[0:0]setfield=tff;channelsplit=channel_layout=8" -acodec pcm_s16le "%mytimestamp%_XDCAM_50Mbps_8CH.mxf"


ffmpeg.exe -y -f dshow -r 29.97 -video_size 1920x1080 -rtbufsize 700M -framerate 29.97 -top 1 -pixel_format uyvy422 -sample_rate 48000 -sample_size 16 -channels 2 -i "video=Decklink Video Capture:audio=Decklink Audio Capture"  -timecode %time% -pix_fmt yuv422p -map [v2] -c:v mpeg2video -profile:v 0 -level:v 2 -b:v 11000k -bf 2 -g 15 -filter_complex "[0:0]yadif=0:-1:0[v1];[v1]scale=1280:720[v2];channelsplit=channel_layout=2[MA:0][MA:1];[MA:0][MA:1]amerge[a1]" -map [a1] -acodec mp3 -ac 2 "%mytimestamp%_MPEG2_2_channel.ts"
preset4: ffmpeg.exe -y -f dshow -video_size 1920x1080 -rtbufsize 700M -framerate 29.97 -top 1 -pixel_format uyvy422 -use_wallclock_as_timestamps 1 -sample_rate 48000 -sample_size 16 -channels 2 -i "video=Decklink Video Capture:audio=Decklink Audio Capture"  -timecode %time% -pix_fmt yuv422p -map [v2] -c:v libx264 -preset fast -crf 28 -filter_complex "[0:0]yadif=0:-1:0[v1];[v1]scale=1280:720[v2];channelsplit=channel_layout=2[MA:0][MA:1];[MA:0][MA:1]amerge[a1]" -map [a1] -acodec mp3 -ac 2 -f mpegts "%mytimestamp%_x264_stereo.ts"
preset5: ffmpeg2016.exe -f dshow -r ntsc -video_size 1920x1080 -rtbufsize 300M -framerate ntsc -top 1 -pixel_format uyvy422 -sample_rate 48000 -sample_size 16 -channels 2 -i "video=Decklink Video Capture:audio=Decklink Audio Capture" -pix_fmt yuv420p -c:v libx264 -crf 25 -preset:v veryfast -tune zerolatency -filter_complex "[0:0]yadif=0:-1:0[v1];[v1]scale=1280:720;channelsplit=channel_layout=2" -c:a aac -ab 128k -ac 2 -f flv rtmp://10.10.108.221:1935/sbsonair
